Robert J. Dettling the Constitution IS theirs, yours, and mine. It's not about cows and land. You went to university in California... unconscionable things are going on there too. These men did in fact petition for redress for years but the government ignored them... normally that would result in a default judgement for the plaintiff... but that's in a world where the system is honest. They had no other legal recourse. I'd be happy to talk to you about this if you want, just hit me up on chat.
